column5: Hello, My brother and I will be doing our first fly in fishing trip next month (JULY). We will be fishing a private lake called Little gouin. We will be fishing for pike and walleye. I have searched the internet for any info on the lake or even videos of others fishing it. I can't find anything. Any one ever fished and can share their adventure. Thank you.
Better plan for 2021 pal,that punk Trudeau ain't opening border anytime soon
I'm in canada. I will be able to go fish there. It was actually a last minute plan.
Thatâ€™s awesome n you have the pick of the litter of camps to fish

Excellent,I've never fished with Caesar's but I've visited Oliver at his camp in Clova when I was going in with air tamarac.hes a good guy and will take care of you,just watch out for those crazy logtruck drivers on the stone road from mont st. Michels to clova,they fly around blind turns
